title: Understanding Track Changes
text: Track Changes is a feature in word processing software that allows you to see what changes have been made to a document. It is useful for collaboration and editing.

title: Who can see the changes?
text: When Track Changes is turned on, both you and others can see the changes made to the document. This includes additions, deletions, and formatting changes.

hintAnswer: keeps a record of changes from yourself and others
title: What does tracking changes do?
text: Select the correct answer from the options provided.
choices: keeps a record of changes that others, but not yourself, make
keeps a record of your own changes
keeps a record of changes from yourself and others
